scripts.start: cross-env ZUM_BACK_MODE=deploy BASE_PATH=src NODE_ENV=production ts-node src/backend/Server.ts
scripts.frontend:build: cross-env BASE_PATH=src vue-cli-service build --no-clean && cross-env BASE_PATH=src ZUM_FRONT_MODE=ssr vue-cli-service build --no-clean
scripts.backend:dev: cross-env BASE_PATH=src NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec ts-node --transpile-only src/backend/Server.ts
